name: jira-orchestrator
description: Arbiter (Enterprise Ultimate) - Complete enterprise Jira orchestration platform with AI-powered Intelligence, Event Sourcing, Advanced Orchestration Patterns, Enterprise Analytics, Multi-Project Portfolio Management, Approval Workflows, Notification System, Team Capacity Planning, SLA Monitoring, Compliance Reporting, and Batch Operations. Features 60+ specialized agents and 25+ slash commands for end-to-end development lifecycle automation.
features: Notification System (v4.0) - Slack, Teams, Email, Webhooks with smart routing
Approval Workflows (v4.0) - Multi-level approvals, policy enforcement, governance
Portfolio Management (v4.0) - Multi-project dashboards, roadmaps, dependencies
Release Coordination (v4.0) - Release planning, notes generation, rollback
Batch Operations (v4.0) - Bulk updates, imports, exports with rollback
Team Capacity (v4.0) - Workload balancing, skill mapping, burnout detection
SLA Monitoring (v4.0) - Real-time SLA tracking, breach prediction, escalation
Compliance Reporting (v4.0) - SOC2, GDPR, ISO27001 evidence collection
Event Sourcing System (v3.0) - Audit trails, time-travel debugging, state reconstruction
Intelligence Module (v3.0) - Predictive analytics, pattern recognition, velocity forecasting
Advanced Orchestration Patterns (v3.0) - Blackboard, Circuit Breaker, Saga, Dynamic Replanning
Real-time Metrics Dashboard (v3.0) - SLA tracking, agent performance, cost analysis
Sprint Planning Automation (v3.0) - Capacity, velocity, WSJF prioritization
Quality Intelligence (v3.0) - Tech debt, health scoring, hotspot detection
Task Preparation (v3.0) - Subtask creation, enrichment, work breakdown structure
Parallel Sub-Issue Work (v2.0)
Expert Agent Matching (v2.0)
Tag Management (v2.0)
Completion Flow with Gap Analysis (v2.0)
Commit Tracking & Issue Commenting (v2.0)
Smart Commits v1.1
GitHub-Jira Integration Suite v1.4.0
6-Phase Protocol
Confluence Integration
Multi-Cloud Deployment Tracking
